instructions.ar: انعطف يميناً حاداً لتبقى على Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.da: Drej skarpt til højre videre ad Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.de: Scharf rechts weiterfahren auf Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ege dekstren al Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Gira a la derecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la derecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fi: Jatka jyrkästi oikeaan pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Tourner franchement à droite pour rester sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.he: פנה בחדות ימינה כדי להישאר על Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.hu: Forduljon élesen jobbra, majd maradjon a Cool highway (Ref1) szakaszon
instructions.id: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Fai una curva stretta a destra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ja: 大きく右に曲がり、Cool highway(Ref1)を進む
instructions.my: Cool highway( Ref1)ပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ညာဘက်ထောင့်ချိုးကွေ့ပါ
instructions.nl: Sla scherp rechts af om op Cool highway (Ref1) te blijven
instructions.no: Sving skarpt til høyre for å bli værende på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo w ostry zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva fechada a direita para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-PT: Vire acentuadamente à direita para se manter em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ro: Virați puternic la dreapta pe Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Резко поверните направо на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sl: Zavijte ostro desno, da ostanete na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Sväng höger och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için sağa keskin dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть різко праворуч щоб залишитись на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.vi: Quẹo gắt bên phải để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.yo: Ṣe idasilẹ to dara lati duro si Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.zh-Hans: 前方右急转弯，继续在Cool highway（Ref1）上行驶
